snippet: LinkedIn’s shares plunged 43.6 percent on Friday, wiping out nearly $11 billion of market value, after the social network released a revenue forecast that fell far short of expectations.
abstract: LinkedIn's stock falls 43.6 percent, erasing almost $11 billion of market value, after social network releases disappointing revenue forecast.
lead_paragraph: LinkedIn’s shares plunged 43.6 percent on Friday, wiping out nearly $11 billion of market value, after the social network released a revenue forecast that fell far short of expectations.

headline.main: LinkedIn Stock Sinks After Revenue Falls Short
